name: Personal Finance App
description: Budgeting, expense tracking, savings goals, and financial insights

issues.title: Build transaction logging system
issues.body:
## Description
Manual transaction entry.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Add transactions
- [ ] Categories
- [ ] Date and amount
- [ ] Notes and tags
- [ ] Recurring transactions

issues.title: Implement bank account integration
issues.body:
## Description
Connect bank accounts.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Plaid integration
- [ ] Auto-sync transactions
- [ ] Multiple accounts
- [ ] Balance tracking
- [ ] Secure authentication

issues.title: Create category management
issues.body:
## Description
Organize spending by category.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Default categories
- [ ] Custom categories
- [ ] Auto-categorization
- [ ] Recategorize
- [ ] Category icons

issues.title: Build spending insights dashboard
issues.body:
## Description
Visualize spending patterns.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Monthly summary
- [ ] Category breakdown
- [ ] Spending trends
- [ ] Charts and graphs
- [ ] Export reports

issues.title: Implement budget creation and tracking
issues.body:
## Description
Set and monitor budgets.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Create budgets
- [ ] Category limits
- [ ] Budget vs actual
- [ ] Overspending alerts
- [ ] Budget templates

issues.title: Add savings goals
issues.body:
## Description
Set and track savings goals.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Create goals
- [ ] Target amount
- [ ] Target date
- [ ] Progress tracking
- [ ] Automatic transfers

issues.title: Create bill reminders
issues.body:
## Description
Track and remind upcoming bills.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Add bills
- [ ] Due date reminders
- [ ] Recurring bills
- [ ] Payment tracking
- [ ] Bill calendar
